models.name: job_performance_eval_evaluation_cycles
models.description: This table stores information about evaluation cycles used in the Job Performance Evaluation system. Each cycle defines a period for evaluations, including names, start and end dates, and implementation status. It includes timestamps for audit and supports soft deletion.

plainFields.name: cycle_code
plainFields.description: Unique code representing the evaluation cycle.

plainFields.name: cycle_name
plainFields.description: Descriptive name of the evaluation cycle.

plainFields.name: start_date
plainFields.description: Starting datetime of the evaluation cycle period.

plainFields.name: end_date
plainFields.description: Ending datetime of the evaluation cycle period.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Flag indicating whether this evaluation cycle is currently active.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp, null if not deleted.

models.name: job_performance_eval_system_settings
models.description: This table holds global system settings for the Job Performance Evaluation service, including parameters that control general behaviors and configurations. It tracks key-value pairs with descriptions and timestamps for auditing and soft deletion.

plainFields.name: setting_key
plainFields.description: Unique key identifying the system setting.

plainFields.name: setting_value
plainFields.description: Value corresponding to the system setting key.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description providing context or notes about the system setting.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp, null if not deleted.

models.name: job_performance_eval_employees
models.description: Employee identity and authentication information for the Job Performance Evaluation service. Includes email, password hash for login, personal name, and temporal audit fields. Unique email ensures no duplicates. Soft delete support via deleted_at to enable account recovery or deactivation. This table represents primary business entity for employees accessing the evaluation system.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Employee's unique email address used for login and notifications.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for authentication. Never store plaintext passwords.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Employee's full name.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when record was soft deleted, NULL if active.

models.name: job_performance_eval_managers
models.description: Manager identity and authentication information for the Job Performance Evaluation service. Includes email, password hash for login, full name, and temporal audit fields. Unique email ensures distinct manager accounts. Supports soft delete with deleted_at. This table is a primary business entity for manager users who supervise employees.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Manager's unique email address used for login and notifications.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for authentication. Passwords are never stored in plaintext.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Manager's full name.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp; if null, record is active.

models.name: job_performance_eval_job_groups
models.description: Job Group represents the top-level job classification in the organizational hierarchy. It categorizes broad job families to organize job roles systematically. This model serves as the parent entity for job series and is fundamental for job architecture management.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the job group.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the job group.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the job group.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if applicable.

models.name: job_performance_eval_job_series
models.description: Job Series represents the mid-level job classification under a job group. It helps segment job roles into more specific clusters. This model references the parent job group and is essential for maintaining job hierarchy.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the job series.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the job series.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the job series.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if applicable.

models.name: job_performance_eval_job_roles
models.description: Job Role represents the specific job function within a job series. It encapsulates roles employees occupy and links to job series for hierarchical clarity. This model is the base for assignments and evaluations.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the job role.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the job role.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the job role.

plainFields.name: growth_level
plainFields.description: Growth Level classification associated with this job role.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if applicable.

models.name: job_performance_eval_task_groups
models.description: Task Group organizes related tasks under job roles for better management and categorization. It groups tasks logically and serves as a parent for tasks.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the task group.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the task group.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the task group.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if applicable.

models.name: job_performance_eval_tasks
models.description: Task represents the detailed work activities under a task group. It specifies tasks employees perform as part of their job role responsibilities.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the task.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the task.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the task.

plainFields.name: knowledge_area_id
plainFields.description: Associated knowledge area's {@link job_performance_eval_knowledge_areas.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if applicable.

models.name: job_performance_eval_task_activities
models.description: Task Activity specifies detailed actionable activities within tasks. It breaks down tasks into finer units for precise evaluation and tracking.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the task activity.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the task activity.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the task activity.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if applicable.

models.name: job_performance_eval_knowledge_areas
models.description: Knowledge Area represents domains of expertise or knowledge relevant to job tasks. It categorizes knowledge areas to support task and skill mappings.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the knowledge area.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the knowledge area.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the knowledge area.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if applicable.

models.name: job_performance_eval_self_evaluations
models.description: This table captures self-evaluation data submitted by employees for each evaluation cycle. It stores scores for different evaluation categories and a mandatory comprehensive comment. It references the employee performing the evaluation and the specific evaluation cycle. Includes temporal fields for auditing and supports soft deletion for data lifecycle management.

foreignFields.name: employee_id
foreignFields.description: The employee who submits the self-evaluation. {@link job_performance_eval_employees.id}.

foreignFields.name: evaluation_cycle_id
foreignFields.description: The evaluation cycle to which this self-evaluation belongs. {@link job_performance_eval_evaluation_cycles.id}.

plainFields.name: evaluation_date
plainFields.description: The date when the self-evaluation is performed.

plainFields.name: work_performance_score
plainFields.description: Score for Work Performance Level evaluation, in scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: knowledge_skill_score
plainFields.description: Score for Knowledge/Skill evaluation, in scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: problem_solving_collab_score
plainFields.description: Score for Problem Solving and Collaboration evaluation, in scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: innovation_score
plainFields.description: Score for Innovation evaluation, in scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: overall_comment
plainFields.description: Comprehensive comment by the employee on the evaluation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of the record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of the record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for the record.

models.name: job_performance_eval_manager_evaluations
models.description: This table records evaluations made by managers for employees in each evaluation cycle. It stores evaluation scores for various categories which may differ from self-evaluations, and includes a comprehensive comment by the manager. It references the manager, employee, and evaluation cycle. It supports auditing and soft deletion.

foreignFields.name: manager_id
foreignFields.description: The manager who performs the evaluation. {@link job_performance_eval_managers.id}.

foreignFields.name: evaluation_cycle_id
foreignFields.description: The evaluation cycle to which this manager evaluation belongs. {@link job_performance_eval_evaluation_cycles.id}.

plainFields.name: evaluation_date
plainFields.description: The date when the manager evaluation is performed.

plainFields.name: work_performance_score
plainFields.description: Manager's score for Work Performance Level evaluation, scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: knowledge_skill_score
plainFields.description: Manager's score for Knowledge/Skill evaluation, scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: problem_solving_collab_score
plainFields.description: Manager's score for Problem Solving and Collaboration evaluation, scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: innovation_score
plainFields.description: Manager's score for Innovation evaluation, scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: overall_comment
plainFields.description: Comprehensive comment by the manager on the evaluation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of the record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: job_performance_eval_evaluation_scores
models.description: This table aggregates detailed evaluation scores for each evaluation entry, linking to either self-evaluation or manager evaluation records and storing individual category scores. This design supports flexible score management and historical tracking per cycle.

foreignFields.name: evaluation_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to evaluation record. Could be either self or manager evaluation. {@link job_performance_eval_self_evaluations.id} or {@link job_performance_eval_manager_evaluations.id}.

plainFields.name: category
plainFields.description: The evaluation category name, e.g., 'work_performance', 'knowledge_skill', 'problem_solving_collab', 'innovation'.

plainFields.name: score
plainFields.description: The score given for the category, scale 1-5.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

models.name: job_performance_eval_employee_comments
models.description: Employee comments on their own performance evaluations, capturing qualitative feedback distinct from numeric scores. Linked to the employee making the comment and to the evaluation cycle. Provides contextual insights into employee perceptions and subjective assessment. Includes timestamps for creation and update tracking. This table is a primary business entity for independent CRUD operations on employee comments.

foreignFields.name: employee_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged employee who authored the comment. {@link job_performance_eval_employees.id}.

foreignFields.name: evaluation_cycle_id
foreignFields.description: Related evaluation cycle of the comment. {@link job_performance_eval_evaluation_cycles.id}.

plainFields.name: comment
plainFields.description: Content of the employee's comment on their evaluation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of when the comment was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of when the comment was last updated.

models.name: job_performance_eval_manager_comments
models.description: Manager comments on employee performance evaluations, providing qualitative feedback separate from numeric evaluation scores. Linked to the manager who authored the comment and the specific evaluation cycle. Enables managerial insights and contextual remarks. Includes creation and update timestamps for audit and tracking. This table is a primary business entity allowing independent management of manager comments.

foreignFields.name: manager_id
foreignFields.description: Manager who authored the comment. {@link job_performance_eval_managers.id}.

foreignFields.name: evaluation_cycle_id
foreignFields.description: Linked evaluation cycle for the comment. {@link job_performance_eval_evaluation_cycles.id}.

plainFields.name: comment
plainFields.description: Content of the manager's comment on the employee's evaluation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp marking when the comment was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp marking last update time of the comment.

models.name: job_performance_eval_evaluation_snapshots
models.description: Historical snapshots of job performance evaluations capturing both employee self-evaluation and manager evaluation data for audit trail and reporting purposes. References evaluation cycles and employees, stores scores and comments point-in-time data with created and updated timestamps. Immutable snapshot data used for historical queries and analysis.

plainFields.name: performance_score
plainFields.description: Employee's self-evaluated job performance score (1-5 scale).

plainFields.name: knowledge_score
plainFields.description: Employee's self-evaluated knowledge and skills score (1-5 scale).

plainFields.name: problem_solving_score
plainFields.description: Employee's self-evaluated problem solving and collaboration score (1-5 scale).

plainFields.name: innovation_score
plainFields.description: Employee's self-evaluated innovation score (1-5 scale).

plainFields.name: manager_performance_score
plainFields.description: Manager's evaluation of job performance score (1-5 scale).

plainFields.name: manager_knowledge_score
plainFields.description: Manager's evaluation of knowledge and skills score (1-5 scale).

plainFields.name: manager_problem_solving_score
plainFields.description: Manager's evaluation of problem solving and collaboration score (1-5 scale).

plainFields.name: manager_innovation_score
plainFields.description: Manager's evaluation of innovation score (1-5 scale).

plainFields.name: employee_comment
plainFields.description: Employee's comprehensive comment about the evaluation.

plainFields.name: manager_comment
plainFields.description: Manager's comprehensive comment about the employee's evaluation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Snapshot creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Snapshot last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for logical record removal.

models.name: job_performance_eval_team_statistics
models.description: Aggregated team-level statistics summarizing job performance evaluation results per evaluation cycle and organizational team unit. Supports reporting and analytics for management reviews and HR insights. Maintains counts, averages, and score distributions with temporal metadata.

plainFields.name: team_id
plainFields.description: Organizational team identifier referenced from team master data.

plainFields.name: average_performance_score
plainFields.description: Average job performance score for the team during the evaluation cycle.

plainFields.name: average_knowledge_score
plainFields.description: Average knowledge and skills score for the team during the evaluation cycle.

plainFields.name: average_problem_solving_score
plainFields.description: Average problem solving and collaboration score for the team during the evaluation cycle.

plainFields.name: average_innovation_score
plainFields.description: Average innovation score for the team during the evaluation cycle.

plainFields.name: evaluation_count
plainFields.description: Number of individual evaluations included in the team's statistics.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for logical record removal.
